snippet.title: DYE - Steam Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/503550

DYE is a challenging twitch platformer where you help Hue rescue Pigments and defeat the nefarious Necrolights in order to restore color to the world! Jump, wall jump and float your way through 4 unique worlds with hundreds of challenges ranging from beginner to expert level.

Key Features
 - 56 levels (560 total pigments to collect)
 - 4 worlds with unique boss fights
 - Hard Mode versions of each level
 - Challenge levels
 - Scaling difficulty from beginner to expert level
 - Original 18 track soundtrack (55 minutes)
 - Achievements
 - Trading cards
